title: Sans on the cover of ESPN
content:
Any ideas about this font used on an ESPN cover is? Thanks!

[http://espnmediazone.com/us/files/2012/06/E-062512-COVERXPROMO1.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714213246/http:/espnmediazone.com/us/files/2012/06/E-062512-COVERXPROMO1.jpeg "http://espnmediazone.com/us/files/2012/06/E-062512-COVERXPROMO1.jpeg")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rickey.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714213246/http:/typophile.com/files/rickey.jpg) | 60.81 KB |
author: reidh

comments.content: Firstly thought it could have been a bespoke typeface exclusively done for ESPN The Magazine. Found 2 similars [Atrament](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714213246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/atrament) and [Malleable Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714213246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pagan-sharp/malleable-grotesque). Gave up twice. Finally, found [Aveny](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714213246/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.playtype.com/index.php%3Fq%3Dnode/331) and looks quite matching everything (part of /G).
